title: If a S5 Duo queues with a G5, what rank of players will you be queued up with?
body:
So im currently in silver and my mate is in gold. We havent played SoloQ together yet but im curious, if im S5 and he is G5 and we duo Q, what will the average rank of players be that we are queued with?
Common sense tells me we would like be queued with players around the S2 level, so it would be easier than normal for him but harder for me. Tried searching the net for an answer but couldnt find anything on this topic.

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
you would get ranks all over the place
im a gold 2 and get games with plat 4s and silver 2s in the same game
